verses.text: The word that Isaiah the son of Amoz saw concerning Judah and Jerusalem.

And it shall come to pass in the last days , \add that\add* the mountain of the \nd \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* house shall be established in the top of the mountains , and shall be exalted above the hills ; and all nations shall flow unto it.\f + \fr 2.2 \ft established: or, prepared\f*

And many people shall go and say , Come ye, and let us go up to the mountain of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, to the house of the God of Jacob ; and he will teach us of his ways , and we will walk in his paths : for out of Zion shall go forth the law , and the word of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* from Jerusalem.

And he shall judge among the nations , and shall rebuke many people : and they shall beat their swords into plowshares , and their spears into pruninghooks : nation shall not lift up sword against nation , neither shall they learn war any more.\f + \fr 2.4 \ft pruninghooks: or, scythes\f*
O house of Jacob , come ye, and let us walk in the light of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*. \p

¶ Therefore thou hast forsaken thy people the house of Jacob , because they be replenished from the east , and \add are\add* soothsayers like the Philistines , and they please themselves in the children of strangers.\f + \fr 2.6 \ft from…: or, more than the\f*\f + \fr 2.6 \ft please…: or, abound with the\f*
Their land also is full of silver and gold , neither \add is there any\add* end of their treasures ; their land is also full of horses , neither \add is there any\add* end of their chariots :
Their land also is full of idols ; they worship the work of their own hands , that which their own fingers have made :
And the mean man boweth down , and the great man humbleth himself: therefore forgive them not. \p
¶ Enter into the rock , and hide thee in the dust , for fear of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and for the glory of his majesty.
The lofty looks of man shall be humbled , and the haughtiness of men shall be bowed down , and the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* alone shall be exalted in that day.

For the day of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of hosts \add shall be\add* upon every \add one that is\add* proud and lofty , and upon every \add one that is\add* lifted up ; and he shall be brought low :
And upon all the cedars of Lebanon , \add that are\add* high and lifted up , and upon all the oaks of Bashan ,
And upon all the high mountains , and upon all the hills \add that are\add* lifted up ,
And upon every high tower , and upon every fenced wall ,
And upon all the ships of Tarshish , and upon all pleasant pictures.\f + \fr 2.16 \ft pleasant…: Heb. pictures of desire\f*
And the loftiness of man shall be bowed down , and the haughtiness of men shall be made low : and the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* alone shall be exalted in that day.
And the idols he shall utterly abolish.\f + \fr 2.18 \ft he…: or, shall utterly pass away\f*

And they shall go into the holes of the rocks , and into the caves of the earth , for fear of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and for the glory of his majesty , when he ariseth to shake terribly the earth.\f + \fr 2.19 \ft of the earth: Heb. of the dust\f*

In that day a man shall cast his idols of silver , and his idols of gold , which they made \add each one\add* for himself to worship , to the moles and to the bats ;\f + \fr 2.20 \ft his idols of silver…: Heb. the idols of his silver, etc\f*\f + \fr 2.20 \ft each…: or, for him\f*

To go into the clefts of the rocks , and into the tops of the ragged rocks , for fear of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and for the glory of his majesty , when he ariseth to shake terribly the earth.
Cease ye from man , whose breath \add is\add* in his nostrils : for wherein is he to be accounted of ?
